News.Title: Aprameya Engineering Reports Strong Turnaround with 68M Rupees Net Profit
News.Summary: Aprameya Engineering achieved a net profit of 68 million rupees in H1, marking a significant turnaround from a loss of 18 million rupees in the same period last year. The company's revenue surged to 421 million rupees compared to 93 million rupees in the previous year's H1 period, representing substantial year-over-year growth across both profitability and revenue metrics.
